title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: KVSS Women's 100% Pure Cashmere Hooded Cardigan Machine Washable Cashmere Zip Up Hoodie with Pocket Long Sleeve Cardigan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Upgrade Hoodie
items.body: This hoodie has all the best qualities of your favorite hoodie but with a luxurious feel of 100% cashmere. It is warm, soft and comfortable. While it is a hoodie, it has a more elegant look and can be dressed up or down. It is expensive, but not outrageous for cashmere and with proper care, it should last for years. It is a classic look that will never go out of style so it is a great wardrobe staple. Read more
items.author: Jacki Wilson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice cardigan, sleeves are a bit short
items.body: This zip up hooded cashmere jacket is comfortable and soft, but the sleeves are a bit short for my arms if I extend them out in front of me. The sleeve length is listed in the size chart for this jacket, so make sure you check! I usually wear a women's Large, and occasionally come across the short sleeve length issue. The quality of the cashemere is very nice; however, the metal of the zipper toggle is very lightweight, super shiny, and feels a little cheap for the cost of this jacket. The zipper gets stuck a lot and is difficult to actually use. It tends to get stuck while trying to zip up or down, especially the second, bottom most zipper. This jacket looks nice on, and is warm and cozy without being overly hot. The listing for this jacket states that it's easy to care for and durable. In my experience, cashmere is difficult to maintain, and is most always hand wash or dry clean only. The listing for this jacket states that it's machine washable. I honestly would never try this with cashmere! I will be hand washing this jacket lightly and laying it flat to dry as I do with my other cashmere garments. To be fair, the listing does say to dry clean it as the best cleaning practice. The color of this jacket is great and will compliment many different other colors. The material hasn't pilled and shows no signs of wear after me using it for a couple weeks. Overall, this is a lightweight, soft and warm jacket that looks very nice for casual wear. I don't think the price is quite right for what you're getting with the questionable zipper, as it feels like plastic coated with a metallic paint and doesn't work well. Read more
items.author: Jessica B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully Soft Cardigan Hoodie, Consider Sizing Up
items.body: This is a very soft and pretty cashmere hooded cardigan. The quality of the cashmere feels good, making it a lovely and comfortable piece to wear. In terms of sizing, I found it to be mostly accurate, perhaps running just a touch small. If you prefer a looser, more relaxed fit in your sweaters, or if you often find yourself between sizes, I would recommend considering ordering one size up. Otherwise, it's a great cardigan. The material is wonderfully soft, and the overall quality is impressive. Read more
items.author: Emotionally Flammable

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars High quality, beautifully packaged
items.body: This sweater looks exactly like a zip up hoodie. It’s cashmere, so I feel like there’s a weird disconnect because cashmere is supposed to be luxury and a hoodie just isn’t. It is soft, and it is comfortable so it gets points for that. However, it’s very expensive for a plain gray hoodie. It does come beautifully packaged in a gift box. If you have somebody that loves hoodies and loves cashmere, this would be a great gift. It just is very specific. For those reasons, I’m giving it four out of five stars. Read more
items.author: Michelle Cohen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ridiculously soft, luxury true cashmere, casual look
items.body: The tag confirms the description of 100% cashmere. This hoodie is as gorgeous and amazing as you would hope. It fits true to size. Easy to zip. It's got luxurious feel with a casual look. Suitable for everyday, but with style and softness that's unmatched. Highly recommend. Great value. Read more
items.author: Christy Nunez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality material, zipper a bit hard to use, runs small
items.body: I ordered this in a large, but it really fit as a medium. I would order a size up to be safe. The material is fantastic; it seems like real cashmere and is extremely soft and comfortable. The style of the hoodie is also great. The one problem we had is the zipper. The zipper itself is good quality, but I suppose in the effort to hide it, the insert pin of the zipper is inset so far into the seam it is hard to get it into the zipper (see attached photo). This makes it unnecessarily difficult to close and zip, especially if you're in a hurry. Other than that, it's a fantastic hoodie, but at this price, I would really expect everything to be perfect. Read more
items.author: DE

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: This is a beautifully made sweater. It is incredibly soft. I like the fact that the style will work for both going to the office when worn with slacks or going out in the evening with jeans. I love that it is machine washable, though I'll take care with the cycle and drying. The size seems true, but it might run a little short on taller people. It is great for gifting. I highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: OntheMountain

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious and practical
items.body: This hooded cardigan is exceptionally soft, and the quality of the 100% cashmere is apparent right away. The 'Otter' color is a beautiful, versatile neutral that goes with just about everything in my closet. The construction is excellent; the zipper operates smoothly, the seams are well-finished, and the fit is very comfortable and flattering. The best feature is its machine washability; it came through a delicate cycle perfectly, which makes a luxury item like this so much more practical for regular wear. It's a beautiful, well-made sweater that feels both cozy and elegant. Read more
items.author: Smart Shopper

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Taibai, Otter, Black, Slate. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
